Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.EnglishText: Peddler

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 防具屋「天空堂」
Entry.EnglishText: Armor Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋「泰蒼」
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 武器屋「蒼獣の牙」
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード・装備品屋・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd - Weapon Shop - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませ。 装飾品などを取り扱っております。 何かおいりようでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome! I sell accessories, anything here catch your eye?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 装飾品を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Accessories Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: またどうぞ、よろしく。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks, come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、どこの人も ヒューマとかガジュマとか 気にしてるみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: You know, recently people have been fussing about Gajuma this and Huma that, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私に言わせたら、そんなの 大した事じゃないね…… 男か女か……それが問題だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think that's too big of a deal... Now, male and female relations on the other hand...

Entry.JapaneseText: この天変地異を乗り越えたら 私も女性の目を見て話せるように なるんじゃないかと思って……
Entry.EnglishText: I think once this crisis is over, I should start practicing speaking to women...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最後の最後まで商売を 続ける事にしたよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll keep selling stuff until the very end!

Entry.JapaneseText: 男女が会話をしては いけないなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: The people here aren't allowed to talk to the opposite sex...

Entry.JapaneseText: この街はすばらしいよ。 だって私は……女性の目を 見て話すのが……苦手だからね。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is amazing! I'm no good at making eye contact with women when I talk to them...

Entry.JapaneseText: またどうぞ、よろしく。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks, come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Right, the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... She can't talk to me because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that she can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh...the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right, those commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: He isn't allowed to talk to women because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはあっち行け、 しっしっ！
Entry.EnglishText: We don't accept Gajuma here, go somewhere else!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはワシの店に なったんじゃー！
Entry.EnglishText: This here's my shop now!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシの子供の頃の夢は ひとつに画家になる事、 ふたつに店を持つ事だったんじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: I had two dreams as a child. The first was to become a painter, the second was to own a store.

Entry.JapaneseText: この歳になって、 そのふたつめの夢が かなうとはのう……
Entry.EnglishText: At my age, I never thought that my second dream would come true...

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋「泰蒼」です！ お安くしておきますよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome to "Serene Blue"! Please, take your time and look around!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖殿にはお参りなされましたか？ まだならば是非、どうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Have you visited the Sanctuary? If not, please do so!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのお客さん…… それも女の人だと安心するわ。
Entry.EnglishText: A Huma customer... And also a woman... Thank goodness.

Entry.JapaneseText: ホント、近頃のガジュマって 感じ悪いから……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm going to be honest, Gajuma make me uneasy these days...

Entry.JapaneseText: このお店のみんなで決めたの。 何が起ころうとも、みんなで 商売を続けようって！
Entry.EnglishText: Those of us at this store have decided that no matter what happens, we need to keep doing business together!

Entry.JapaneseText: いざとなったらみんなで 助け合おうって……！
Entry.EnglishText: We'll help each other in times of need!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖殿にはお参りなされましたか？ まだならば是非、どうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Have you visited the Sanctuary? If not, please do so!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖殿にはお参りなされましたか？ まだならば是非、どうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Have you visited the Sanctuary? If not, please do so!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんにちは。
Entry.EnglishText: Good day!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 武器を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Weapons Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでも 蒼獣様があなたの事を 見守っていてくれています。
Entry.EnglishText: The Azure Beast is always watching over you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマに甘くみられない ためにも、武器は必需品ですよ。 見て行ってください。
Entry.EnglishText: You have to have weapons if you don't want Gajuma to mess with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分の身は自分で守る。 これからはこれですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: One's own body is protected by oneself. No better time than the now!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の世の中、何が起こるか わかりませんよ。 買える時に買ってくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no telling what will happen out there, so buy weapons while you can.

Entry.JapaneseText: この先、何が起こるか わかりませんよ。 今のうちにどうぞ……！
Entry.EnglishText: There's no telling what will happen from here on out. Buy weapons before it's too late...!

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでも 蒼獣様があなたの事を 見守っていてくれています。
Entry.EnglishText: The Azure Beast is always watching over you.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつでも 蒼獣様があなたの事を 見守っていてくれています。
Entry.EnglishText: The Azure Beast is always watching over you.
A-A man...

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませー。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 防具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Armor Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたの心にも 蒼獣様の福音が 届きますように。
Entry.EnglishText: May the Azure Beast's gospel also reach your heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: 長居はしないでくれる？ 近くにヒューマが大勢いると 気分が落ち着かないのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Can you please not stay here too long? Having so many Huma around makes me feel uncomfortable...

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくれなくても、 別にいいけど…… 来た時は何か買ってね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'd rather you not return... But if you do, could you at least buy something?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、よかった…… ヒューマにお店を とられなくって……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank goodness those Huma didn't take over my store...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマに言いたい事は あるけど、商売はするわ。 何か欲しいものはある？
Entry.EnglishText: I have a lot of things to say to Huma, but I need to sell some wares. Is there anything that catches your eye?

Entry.JapaneseText: またどうぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: See you soon...

Entry.JapaneseText: な、何が起こっても…… この街には蒼獣様がいるから、 だ、大丈夫よ、きっと……
Entry.EnglishText: N-No matter what happens, this city will be fine because we are under the p-protection of the Azure Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: こうなりゃ、天変地異の 大セールだよ！ 値段はいつもと同じだけど！
Entry.EnglishText: W-We're having a special Cataclysmic sale right now! Nothing's marked down though!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街が沈むまで、 お店は続けるからね。 また来ておくれよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'll keep manning this store until this town goes under! See you again!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたの心にも 蒼獣様の福音が 届きますように。
Entry.EnglishText: May the Azure Beast's gospel also reach your heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたの心にも 蒼獣様の福音が 届きますように。
Entry.EnglishText: May the Azure Beast's gospel also reach your heart.
